SPoCK 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Setting up a single region model

    Reference

    All functions

    Get_Reference_Points()

    Wrapper function to get reference points

    Setup_Mod_Biologicals()

    Setup biological inputs for estimation model

    Setup_Mod_Catch_and_F()

    Setup fishing mortality and catch observations

    Setup_Mod_Dim()

    Set up model dimensions

    Setup_Mod_FishIdx_and_Comps()

    Setup observed fishery indices and composition data (age and length comps)

    Setup_Mod_Fishsel_and_Q()

    Setup fishery selectivity and catchability specifications

    Setup_Mod_Movement()

    Setup model movement processes

    Setup_Mod_Rec()

    Setup model objects for specifying recruitment module and associated processes

    Setup_Mod_SrvIdx_and_Comps()

    Setup observed survey indices and composition data (age and length comps)

    Setup_Mod_Srvsel_and_Q()

    Setup survey selectivity and catchability specifications

    Setup_Mod_Tagging()

    Setup tagging processes and parameters

    Setup_Mod_Weighting()

    Title

    Setup_Sim_Biologicals()

    Set up simulation stuff for biologicals

    Setup_Sim_Containers()

    Setup containers for simulation and output into global environment

    Setup_Sim_Dim()

    Set up simulation dimensions

    Setup_Sim_FishMort()

    Setup values and dimensions of fishing mortality

    Setup_Sim_FishSel()

    Setup fishery selectivity

    Setup_Sim_Observation_Proc()

    Set up simulation observaiton processes

    Setup_Sim_Rec()

    Set up recruitment dynamics for simulation

    Setup_Sim_Survey()

    Setup values for survey parameterization

    Setup_Sim_Tagging()

    Set up simulated tagging dynamics

    Simulate_Pop()

    Simulates a spatial, sex, and age-structured population and takes a variety of inputs, with dependecies on various functions (see example)

    check_data_dimensions()

    Helper function used within the setup functions to check data dimensions to ensure they are correct

    do_francis_reweighting()

    Function to run Francis reweighting

    do_jitter()

    Function to conduct jitter analysis

    do_likelihood_profile()

    Function to do likelihood profile on a parameter

    do_mcmc()

    To run MCMC for a RTMB object using tmbstan

    do_retrospective()

    Functino to run retrospective analyses

    do_runs_test()

    Runs test function taken from SS3 diags.

    fit_model()

    Run RTMB model

    get_comp_prop()

    Gets composition data proportions normalized according to the assessment specifications from RTMB

    get_francis_weights()

    Function to compute francis weights, which is used internally by do_francis_reweighting

    get_idx_fits()

    Gets index fits results

    get_mcmc_ssb_rec()

    Get ssb and recruitment from MCMC using posterior samples

    get_osa()

    Function to format comp data and get OSA residuals from afscOSA (uses afscOSA and compresid as backend to get OSA residuals)

    get_retrospective_relative_difference()

    Derive relative difference from terminal year from a retrospective analysis.

    mcmc_diag()

    Traditional model diagnostics for MCMC

    mcmc_par_names()

    Gets parameter names from mcmc object

    plot_resids()

    Plots OSA residuals from outputs from get_osa. Much of this code is taken from the afscOM package, but with modificaitons to plot features.

    theme_sablefish()

    GGPLOT theme for sablefish

    Contents

    Developed by Matthew Cheng.
